uuid.description: The unique identifier of the episode.

itemType.description: The type of object.  In this case, an episode.

revision.description: The revision number of the object.  This is used for version management.

slug.description: The machine-name "slug" of the episode to use in its canonical URL.

shortDescription.description: The short description of the episode.

mediumDescription.description: The medium description of the episode.

longDescription.description: The long desciption of the episode.

media.description: A list of media objects associated to the series (can be images or videos).

categories.description: A list of Categories taxonomyTerm UUIDs that is associated with this episode.

tags.description: A list of the Tags taxonomyTerm UUIDs that is associated with this episode.

published.description: A boolean field that identifies whether the episode has been published.

links.description: A List of objects containing URL and text title of link associated to the episode.

contentRating.description: The content rating of the episode.

episodeNumber.description: The episode number of this episode.  This can be used to sort the episodes by the episode number.

episodeType.description: This identifies whether the episode is a TV episode or a Webisode.

datePublished.description: The original airdate of the episode.

productionNumber.description: The production number of the episode.

program.description: The series or event that is the parent program of this episode.

castCredit.description: The Uuid of the cast associated with this object.
